expressions.description: Calcola incremento giornaliero
expressions.expression:
with_variable(
'my_exp', 
array_find(  
array_sort( array_agg( 
expression:= "data" ,
order_by:=  "data"  ) , ascending:=true ) ,  "data" ),
 if( 
@my_exp = 0, 0,
(  "tot_att_pos"  -
(array_agg( 
expression:=  "tot_att_pos"  , 
order_by:=  "data"  )[@my_exp-1]))))
expressions.name: Delta-giornaliero

expressions.description: Due JOIN al volo con due layer diversi
expressions.expression:
with_variable(
'arr',
array_foreach( @layer_ids,  regexp_replace( @element, '^(.+?)(_.+)$','\\1')),

CASE 
WHEN array_contains(@arr, 'file1') and 
"codice1" = attribute(get_feature('file1','codice2',attribute($currentfeature,'codice1')),'codice2')
THEN attribute(get_feature(layer:='file1', attribute:='codice2', value:=attribute($currentfeature,'codice1')),'B')
WHEN array_contains(@arr, 'file2') and 
"codice1" = attribute(get_feature('file2','codice2',attribute($currentfeature,'codice1')),'codice2')
THEN attribute(get_feature(layer:='file2', attribute:='codice2', value:=attribute($currentfeature,'codice1')),'B')
ELSE 'CIAO'
END )
expressions.name: Due join al volo

expressions.name: Effetto Curvy

expressions.description: Estrae il Foglio e la Particella Catastale a partire da un punto ricandente dentro il perimetro di un poligono.
expressions.expression:
/*estrae il foglio e la particella catastale*/
with_variable('fp',
		with_variable('geom3045',
				transform($geometry,'EPSG:4326', @project_crs ),
				get_parcel_info( 
						x( point_on_surface( @geom3045)),
						y( point_on_surface( @geom3045)))),
	regexp_replace( @fp ,'^(.+)\\.(.+)\\.(.+)\\.(.+)_(.+)\\.(.+)$', '\\5/\\6')
			)
expressions.name: Estrae Foglio e Particella Catasto

expressions.expression:
/*estrarre dati da un layer sovrapposto*/

/*soluzione tramite attributi alfanumerici*/
aggregate( 
 layer:='ProvCM01012020_g_WGS84',
 aggregate:='concatenate',
 expression:= "den_uts",
 filter:= "cod_reg" = attribute(@parent,'cod_reg'),
 concatenator:=',' )
 
|| '\n' ||
/*soluzione tramite attributo geometrico*/

aggregate( 
 layer:='ProvCM01012020_g_WGS84',
 aggregate:='concatenate',
 expression:="den_uts",
 filter:=contains(geometry(@parent),$geometry),
 concatenator:=',')
 
|| '\n' ||
/*soluzione tramite attributo geometrico*/

array_to_string(
 overlay_contains(   
 layer:='ProvCM01012020_g_WGS84',
 expression:="den_uts"))
expressions.name: Estrarre dati dal layer sottostante

Generalizza


```

CASE

WHEN $length > 25

THEN

smooth(simplify($geometry,10),21,0.2)

ELSE geom_from_wkt( 'MultiLineString EMPTY')

END

```
expressions.expression:
CASE
WHEN $length >  25
THEN 
smooth(simplify($geometry,10),21,0.2)
ELSE  geom_from_wkt( 'MultiLineString EMPTY')
END

expressions.description:
Realizza una JOIN tabellare al volo!


NOTE:


- `pop_res_regioni_ISTAT20190101` nome del layer 'sinistro` che contiene il dato da visualizzare/usare;

- `cod_ISTAT` nome dell'attributo (pop_res_regioni_ISTAT20190101) da correlare con il layer di `destra`;

- `cod_reg` nome dell'attributo del layer di `destra` da correlare con `cod_ISTAT`del layer di sinistra;

- `pop_res2019` attributo del layer di `sinistra` da usare/visualizzare
expressions.expression:
format_number(
attribute(
get_feature (
layer:='pop_res_regioni_ISTAT20190101',
attribute:='cod_ISTAT',
value:= attribute($currentfeature , 'cod_reg')),
'pop_res2019'),0)
expressions.name: JOIN al volo

expressions.description: Concatena le lunghezze dei lati di un poligono
expressions.expression:
array_to_string(
array_foreach(
array_foreach(
generate_series(1, num_geometries( segments_to_lines($geometry))),
geometry_n(segments_to_lines($geometry),@element)),round(length(@element),2)))
expressions.name: Lunghezza lati poligono

expressions.name: ProprietÃ  Layer

expressions.description:
Relazione al Volo


NOTE:

- `materiali` nome del layer figlio;

- `n_reparto` nome attributo da conteggiare;

- `us` attributo del layer figlio (materiali) da correlare;
- `us_s` nome attributo layer padre
expressions.expression:
aggregate( 
layer:='materiali',
aggregate:='count',
expression:= "n_reperto",
filter:= "us" = attribute(@parent,'us_s') )
expressions.name: Relazione al volo

distance

Array dei campi di un layer.

Sostituire a @layer il nome del layer di interesse
expressions.name: campi di un layer
closest_point per attributo

expressions.description:
with_variable('toto', reverse( geometry(get_feature('percorso','fid',1))),


array_find(

array_filter(

array_sort(

array_agg(

line_locate_point(@toto, line_interpolate_point( intersection($geometry,@toto ),

length(intersection($geometry,@toto)) /2 ) ))), @element >0),


line_locate_point(@toto, line_interpolate_point( intersection($geometry,@toto ),

length(intersection($geometry,geometry(get_feature('percorso','fid',1)))) /2 ) )

)

)
expressions.expression:
with_variable('toto',  reverse( geometry(get_feature('percorso','fid',1))),

array_find( 
array_filter(
array_sort(
array_agg(
line_locate_point(@toto, line_interpolate_point( intersection($geometry,@toto ), 
length(intersection($geometry,@toto)) /2 ) ))), @element >0),

line_locate_point(@toto, line_interpolate_point( intersection($geometry,@toto ), 
length(intersection($geometry,geometry(get_feature('percorso','fid',1)))) /2 ) )
) 
)

expressions.name: grassetto stessa etichetta

expressions.expression:
with_variable('index',
array_find( 
 aggregate( 
 layer:='dpc_covid19_ita_regioni_7f6d9240_e7df_4a0f_9b92_3fce411ece8b',
 aggregate:='array_agg',
 expression:=format_date(to_datetime("data"),'yyyy-MM-dd'),
 filter:="denominazione_regione" = @atlas_pagename), "datasetIniISO" ),
 
 aggregate( 
 layer:='dpc_covid19_ita_regioni_7f6d9240_e7df_4a0f_9b92_3fce411ece8b',
 aggregate:='array_agg',
 expression:=to_int("totale_positivi"),
 filter:="denominazione_regione" = @atlas_pagename)[@index])
expressions.name: index

expressions.expression:
/*per etichettare punti in modo ortogonale a una linea*/
line_interpolate_angle( 
overlay_nearest('linea',$geometry)[0],
line_locate_point( 
overlay_nearest('linea',$geometry)[0],
$geometry))
expressions.name: label ortogonali

expressions.expression:
overlay_nearest(
map_akeys( 
with_variable('liv',array('linea','poligoni','edifici'),
with_variable('indice',
array_find(
array_foreach(@liv,
distance(
overlay_nearest(@element,$geometry)[0],
$geometry)),
array_sort(array_foreach(@liv,
distance(
overlay_nearest(@element,$geometry)[0],
$geometry)))[0]),
map(@liv[@indice],
array_sort(array_foreach(@liv,
distance(
overlay_nearest(@element,$geometry)[0],
$geometry)))[0])
)))[0],"name")[0]
expressions.name: layer e feature piÃ¹ vicino

expressions.expression:
difference(
$geometry,
-- bounding Box
make_rectangle_3points(
point_n(bounds($geometry),4),
point_n(bounds($geometry),3),
-- punto altezza rettangolo
 make_point( x(point_n(bounds($geometry),1)),
			 (y(point_n(bounds($geometry),1)))
			 + bounds_height($geometry)*0.5),1))
expressions.name: livello acqua

expressions.description: Posizionamento etichette per poligoni multipart e geometria non convessa
expressions.expression:
CASE WHEN 
num_geometries( $geometry)> 1 THEN 
collect_geometries(array_foreach( 
generate_series(1,num_geometries( $geometry)),
point_on_surface(geometry_n($geometry,@element))))
ELSE centroid($geometry)
END
expressions.name: posizionamento
punto centrale tra geometrie che si toccano
stiloso

expressions.expression:
aggregate( 
 layer:='@layer_name',
 aggregate:= 'concatenate',
 expression:= "Rischio",
 filter:= intersects($geometry, geometry(@parent)) )
expressions.name: tema per posizione

expressions.expression:
make_line( array(make_point(x(centroid($geometry)),y(centroid($geometry)))),
array_foreach(
array(
make_point(
array_foreach( 
relation_aggregate( 
relation:='rel1',
aggregate:='array_agg',
expression:=$id), @element+x(centroid($geometry)))[$id],
array_foreach( 
relation_aggregate( 
relation:='rel1',
aggregate:='array_agg',
expression:="totale_casi"), @element+y(centroid($geometry)))[$id]
)), @element) )
expressions.name: test
